_sText:
Egon World - Bomb/Defuse
 
Counter-Terrorists: You must prevent
the terrorists from bombing any of 
the recently discovered egonic 
buildings.

Terrorists: Destroy one of the two targets
to stop investigators from finding out
what this egon world is.

NOTE TO ADMINS: In order to allow clients
to download the map from your server, you
must change net_maxfilesize to a higher
value than the default of 15
(e.g. net_maxfilesize 22)

Made by Adam aka Egon.
You can contact me through my gmail:
evil.egon@gmail.com
